metadata.title: CVE-2014-2570 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in www/make_subset.php in PHP FontLib before 0.3.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via the name parameter.

criterions.comment: php-font-lib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
